plot: A young angel was sent to help and protect a famous 'bon-vivant' photographer, who is being threatened both by Nazis and Nazi-hunters.
plot_en: A young angel was sent to help and protect a famous 'bon-vivant' photographer, who is being threatened both by Nazis and Nazi-hunters.
plot_es: A young angel was sent to help and protect a famous 'bon-vivant' photographer, who is being threatened both by Nazis and Nazi-hunters.
title: Um Anjo Caiu do Céu
